markdownRemark.html:
Let’s Work Together

Kuokoa Studio
111 Hekili Street
Suite A498
Kailua, HI 96734

(808) 343-7953

aloha@kuokoa.studio

Availability

Typically online by 8:00AM HST, Monday through Thursday.

Ideally disconnected by 4:00PM HST and closed Friday through Sunday as well as most standard US Holidays.

Communication

Written correspondence such as chat, email or txt is preferable.

For anything urgent and requiring immediate attention, a direct phone call is best.

Meetings

Telephone and video can be arranged and times are extraordinarily flexible given advance notice.

Rescheduling or canceling is ok — even last minute.
